titleStmt.title: Obedience and submission A sermon preached at St. Sauiours-Church in South-warke, at a visitation, on Tuesday, the eigth [sic] day of December: anno Dom. 1635. By Iohn Fealtly.
titleStmt.author: Featley, John, 1605?-1666.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-D⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
